Assessment.TestCriteria: Please create a C#.NET MVC app with a view that pulls in this list of jobs(https://gist.githubusercontent.com/WillemLabu/34cfb50187ec334c48ee/raw/cb46400505afd82d9e354b591ad71d97f07613be/jobs.json) dynamically (don't copy and paste it) into a styled table on a page.Make sure the table is paginated with 10 jobs per page.Incorporate a search function, and make the whole page responsive if you can.You can use any framework on the front-end.Points for simplicity and style.Once that's done, please push your project into a repo on Github, and send me a link.
